Posts.Content: I had a mammogram two years after a sterotactic biopsy was negative. Now they recalled me in for additional views for a very small density of soft tissue associated with the biopsy. WHY? There is always scar tissue isnt there after these biopsies. I hhad a bad hematoma which left a residual lump there, and was confirned non pathological. Im going nuts here.They said Probably benign but we want to evaluate?????????????
Posts.Title: mammogram not quite normal

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by brainman suedonny, I am very sorry that you have this too worry about. Since it has been 2 years, maybe it is just a routine follow-up? I have to have an MRI every 9-12 months to make sure my brain cancer has not recurred. Better safe than sorry. Jim I know, my husband has lymphoma I never had cancer but each test scares me, when something isnt quite right, thank you for following up my question. God Bless
Posts.Title: mammogram not quite normal

Posts.Content: I had a biopsy two years ago which left a hematoma, consequently a mammogram left and showed a small density at the marker placed inside...I had follow up in six months..which showed no dangerous findings, now they want to do another one in four months what is this?
Posts.Title: hello too many mammograms?
